entry.title: Monday: Chance of showers. High 6. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of showers this afternoon. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near noon. High 6. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Monday 09 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low minus 3. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of rain showers this evening and 30 percent chance of flurries before morning. Fog patches developing this evening and dissipating after midnight. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 after midnight. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Monday 09 January 2023
